scan_qr_code_instruction: Scan this QR code with your authentication app:
confirm_remove_friend: Do you really want to remove {{name}}?
disable_2fa_confirmation: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA? You will need to re-enable it later.
delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
2fa_enable_error: Failed to enable 2FA. Please try again.
2fa_disable_error: Failed to disable 2FA. Please try again.
2fa_waiting_code_error: 2FA enabled. Please enter the code sent to your authentication app.
loging_error: Login failed. Please check your email and password.
google_auth_error: Google authentication failed. Please try again.
username_format_error: Username must be between 1 and 16 characters long and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
email_format_error: Email must be a valid email address.
password_format_error: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
registration_error: Registration failed. Please check your details and try again.
profile_fetch_error: Failed to fetch profile information. Please try again later.
invalid_image_format_error: Invalid image format. Please upload a valid image file.
invalid_json_format_error: Invalid JSON format. Please check your data.
status_update_error: Failed to update status. Please try again.
delete_account_error: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
friends_fetch_error: Failed to fetch friends list. Please try again.
requests_sent_fetch_error: Failed to fetch sent friend requests. Please try again.
requests_received_fetch_error: Failed to fetch received friend requests. Please try again.
generic_fetch_error: Failed to fetch data. Please try again.
request_send_error: Failed to send friend request. Please try again.
request_cancel_error: Failed to cancel friend request. Please try again.
request_accept_error: Failed to accept friend request. Please try again.
request_decline_error: Failed to decline friend request. Please try again.
request_delete_error: Failed to delete friend request. Please try again.
generic_decline_error: Failed to decline action. Please try again.
generic_accept_error: Failed to accept action. Please try again.
generic_cancel_error: Failed to cancel action. Please try again.
generic_send_error: Failed to send data. Please try again.
